Magnetic Levitation: Use magnets to levitate objects in mid-air, making it possible to move them around without any physical contact.
Magnetic Memory: Develop a new type of computer memory that uses magnets instead of traditional electronic components, making it faster, more energy-efficient, and more reliable.
Magnetic Energy Conversion: Create a device that converts kinetic energy into magnetic energy, allowing it to be harnessed and used to power vehicles or other machines.
Magnetic Medical Imaging: Develop a new medical imaging technique that uses magnets to create detailed images of the human body, allowing doctors to diagnose and treat diseases more accurately.
Magnetic Space Propulsion: Create a new type of spacecraft that uses magnets to propel itself through space, making it faster and more efficient than current spacecraft.
